Sebamed Everyday Shampoo - Imported (200 ml) Price: Rs.2600

Sebamed Everyday Shampoo for Normal to Dry Hair 6. 8 fl oz (200 ml). Quality through researchIdeal for healthy skin100% soap amp alkali-free Retains moisture amp adds volume Hypoallergenic Non-irritating with mild organic cleansing agents Same pH as healthy skin -- 5. 5 Dermatologist RecommendedRecommended For:Sensitive scalp and dry stressed hair Noticeably healthier smoother skin Maintaining skin s natural barrierDeveloped by dermatologists this botanically-based shampoo protects the natural balance of your hair and scalp. Gentle enough for daily use this mild formula will not strip natural oils or irritate scalp as soap-based shampoo can. Helps maintain the intrinsic structural integrity of your hair enhancing sheen and leaving hair soft and healthy looking. sebamed pH 5. 5The Science Behind Healthy SkinEvery sebamed product is meticulously formulated to a pH balance of healthy skin. this is essential in maintaining your skin s natural hydrolipid barrier against environmental stress. Any other pH level such as found in soap may leave you skin open to break-down and deterioration. Discover what 150 clinical studies have already shown -- pH 5. 5 is vital for healthy skin. All sebamed products are tested and developed in cooperation with leading dermatologic researchers. The sebamed skincare line reflects the latest in dermatology research formulated to help maintain the natural health of your skin. the sebamed system of cleansing and skincare products is soap-free and pH balanced to perfectly match your sensitive skin. Nearly 100% Biodegradable. Cruelty Free. Made in Germany
